page.title: 20GREAT MEOLS:PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content:
Within the assigned area public transport is limited to a single bus service(Meols to Chester),on an hourly basis.Adjacent to the block Merseyside Passenger Transport,together with Crosville Services, provides regular services to all areas of the Wirral Peninsula and beyond. Rail transport(Wirral line) connects with both local and mainline networks. Most residents commute by car and limited use is made of public service facilities.(ref. page 9 of survey.)
{ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS Mr.J.T.Owen,Headteacher,Mrs.J.Millward Governor,Miss I.D.Clayton,the children and parents;Great Meols Primary School.The Rev. K.J.Pritchard, Vicar of St.John's and all contributers, editors and data processors involved in this project.
